mapper.sql: id, business_id, asset_group, number, name, install_type, serial, area_id, category_model, manufacturer, asset_status, admittance_status, operation_system, operation_system_name, responsible_user_id, location, house_location, uuid, asset_source, importance_degree, describle, first_enter_nett, first_discover_time, is_innet, service_life, buy_date, version, warranty, install_template_id, baseline_template_id, baseline_template_correlation_gmt, install_template_correlation_gmt,machine_name, is_secrecy, code, step_node, memo, gmt_create, gmt_modified, create_user, modify_user, status, net_status, is_orphan, custom_field,soft_version,is_borrow,rectification

number, step_node, name, install_type, serial, area_id, category_model, manufacturer, asset_status, admittance_status, operation_system, operation_system_name, responsible_user_id, house_location, uuid, asset_source, importance_degree, describle, first_enter_nett, first_discover_time, is_innet, service_life, buy_date, version, warranty, install_template_id, baseline_template_id, baseline_template_correlation_gmt, install_template_correlation_gmt, memo, gmt_create, gmt_modified, create_user, modify_user, net_status, is_orphan, custom_field, machine_name, is_secrecy, code, net_type, install_date, activiate_date, expiration_reminder, is_borrow
mapper.insert: insert into baseline_asset_template_hist ( asset_id, template_hist_id, template_hist_name, gmt_create, create_user, is_new, is_change ) values ( #{assetId}, #{templateHistId}, #{templateHistName}, #{gmtCreate}, #{createUser}, #{isNew}, #{isChange} )
mapper.delete: update asset_rollback set status=0 where asset_id=#{assetId}
mapper.select:
select
from

select
from

select count(1) count from ( select DISTINCT asset.id from asset asset left join asset_ip_relation air on asset.id = air.asset_id and air.status=1 left join asset_mac_relation amr on asset.id = amr.asset_id and amr.status=1 left join asset_user asset_user on asset.responsible_user_id = asset_user.id and asset_user.status=1 left join asset_business_relation abr on asset.id=abr.asset_id and abr.status=1
) t

SELECT count(1) count FROM asset a left JOIN asset_network_equipment b on a.id = b.asset_id and b.`status` = 1 left JOIN asset_safety_equipment d on a.id = d.asset_id AND d.`status` = 1 left JOIN asset_network_card c on a.id = c.asset_id and c.`status` = 1 WHERE (b.inner_ip = #{ip} OR c.ip_address = #{ip} OR d.ip = #{ip}) AND a.`status` = 1 AND a.status !=9

select distinct manufacturer from
where status = 1

select
from
where 1 = 1
and category_model in
#{item}

select asset_status, count(asset_status) num from
where status=1
and area_id in
#{areaId}
AND asset.id NOT IN ( SELECT id FROM asset WHERE asset_status = 1 AND gmt_modified=0 AND asset_source IN ( 1, 3 ) ) GROUP BY asset_status

select count(1) from
where status=1 and asset_status!=9
and area_id in
#{areaId}

select * from asset where id in
#{item}
mapper.update: update asset SET asset_group = #{assetGroupName} where id = #{assetId}
mapper.select:
select number from
where id = #{id}

select area_id from
where id = #{id}

SELECT ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM asset WHERE category_model =#{categoryModeId} AND `status` = 1 ) + ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM asset_software WHERE category_model =#{categoryModeId} AND `status` = 1) as n

select uuid from
where id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update
set
number = #{number},
name = #{name},
version = #{version},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer},
category_model = #{categoryModel},
step_node = #{stepNode},
business_id = #{businessId},
install_template_id = #{installTemplateId },
baseline_template_id = #{baselineTemplateId },
baseline_template_correlation_gmt = #{baselineTemplateCorrelationGmt},
install_template_correlation_gmt = #{installTemplateCorrelationGmt},
code = #{code },
net_type = #{netType },
is_secrecy = #{isSecrecy },
importance_degree = #{importanceDegree },
machine_name = #{machineName },
soft_version = #{softVersion },
rectification = #{rectification },
asset_group = #{assetGroup }, install_type = #{installType }, asset_source = #{assetSource}, serial = #{serial }, area_id = #{areaId }, operation_system = #{operationSystem }, operation_system_name = #{operationSystemName }, responsible_user_id = #{responsibleUserId }, house_location = #{houseLocation }, location = #{location },
importance_degree = #{importanceDegree }, describle = #{describle }, service_life = #{serviceLife}, buy_date = #{buyDate }, warranty = #{warranty }, activiate_date = #{activiateDate }, is_orphan=#{isOrphan}, is_borrow = #{isBorrow }, is_borrow = #{isBorrow }, expiration_reminder = #{expirationReminder }, install_date = #{installDate }, custom_field=#{customField}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified }, modify_user = #{modifyUser }, memo = #{memo } where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from asset where id!=#{id} and number=#{number}
select count(id) from asset where id!=#{id} and name=#{name}

select count(1) from
where status = 1 and asset_status in (3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10,11)

select asset_id as id, count(asset_id) as count from alarm_current_records
WHERE asset_id IN
#{item}
group by asset_id

SELECT count(1) count FROM asset_mac_relation m LEFT JOIN asset a ON m.asset_id=a.id WHERE
a.id !=#{id} and
a.`code` !='' and
a.`status` =1 AND m.`status` =1 and upper( ( REPLACE ( REPLACE (mac, ':', '' ), '-', '' ) ) ) = upper( REPLACE ( REPLACE ( #{mac}, ':', '' ), '-', '' ) )

update.foreach:
update
first_enter_nett = #{asset.firstEnterNett},
asset_status = #{asset.assetStatus},
gmt_modified = #{asset.gmtModified},
modify_user = #{asset.modifyUser},
`status` = #{asset.status}
where id = #{asset.id}

mapper.select:
SELECT asset.*, `user`.`name` AS responsible_user_name, `user`.`mobile` As contact_tel, anm.net_type_name , acm.name as category_model_name FROM
LEFT JOIN asset_user `user` ON `user`.id = asset.responsible_user_id left join asset_nettype_manage anm on asset.net_type = anm.id and anm.status = 1 left join asset_category_model acm on asset.category_model = acm.id -- LEFT JOIN asset_hard_soft_lib lib ON lib.business_id = asset.operation_system where asset.id=#{id}

SELECT asset.id as stringId, asset.name, asset.number, asset.asset_group as assetGroup, `user`.`name` AS responsibleUserName, akm.key_num as `key`, acm.name as categoryModelName, userlend.`name` as useName FROM
LEFT JOIN asset_user `user` ON `user`.id = asset.responsible_user_id and `user`.status=1 left join asset_key_manage as akm on akm.key_user_id=asset.id and akm.is_delete=1 left join asset_category_model as acm on acm.id=asset.category_model and acm.status=1 left join asset_lend_relation as alr on alr.asset_id=asset.id and alr.status=1 and alr.lend_status =1 LEFT JOIN asset_user `userlend` ON `userlend`.id = alr.use_id and `userlend`.status=1 where asset.id=#{id}

SELECT
assembly.asset_id as assetId, assembly.business_id as businessId, lib.product_name AS productName, lib.supplier, lib.type, assembly.remove, assembly.demagnetization, assembly.smash, assembly.unique_id as uniqueId, assembly.scrap
assembly.asset_id as assetId, assembly.business_id as businessId, lib.product_name AS productName, lib.supplier, lib.type, count(assembly.business_id) as amount
FROM asset_assembly assembly LEFT JOIN asset_assembly_lib lib ON lib.business_id = assembly.business_id WHERE assembly.asset_id = #{id} and assembly.status=1 and lib.status=1
group by assembly.business_id, lib.product_name, lib.supplier, lib.type

SELECT id,name,asset_status as assetStatus,number FROM asset WHERE status=1 AND id IN
#{id}
SELECT DISTINCT bt.id, bt.tp_name as value FROM asset asset INNER JOIN baseline_template_hist bt ON asset.baseline_template_id = bt.id

SELECT manufacturer FROM asset where category_model =3 and status=1
and manufacturer LIKE CONCAT('%',replace(replace(#{supplier},'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
GROUP BY manufacturer
select install_template_id from asset where id = #{assetId}

choose.otherwise: select count(1) from asset where business_id = #{item.businessId}

mapper.select: select origin_status from asset_operation_record where id = (select max(id) from asset_operation_record where target_object_id = #{assetId})

SELECT id,number,asset_status as assetStatus from asset where
1!=1
id in
#{assetId}

choose.when: update ${item.rollbackTableName} set status=0 where asset_id=#{assetId} and ${item.filedName}=#{item.filedValue}
update ${item.rollbackTableName} set status=1 where asset_id=#{assetId} and ${item.filedName}=#{item.filedValue}
update ${item.rollbackTableName} set ${item.filedName}=#{item.filedValue} where id=#{assetId} and status=1

mapper.select:
select count(id) from ( SELECT a.id FROM asset AS a LEFT JOIN asset_ip_relation AS air ON air.asset_id = a.id and air.status=1 LEFT JOIN asset_mac_relation AS amr ON amr.asset_id = a.id and amr.status=1
and a.asset_status in (1,3,4,5,6,8,9) and a.status=1
and a.category_model in
#{item}
and a.area_id in
#{item}
group by a.id ) b

sql.if: ( a.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',replace(replace(#{multipleQuery},'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%') or a.`number` LIKE CONCAT('%',replace(replace(#{multipleQuery},'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%') or air.`ip` LIKE CONCAT('%',replace(replace(#{multipleQuery},'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%') or amr.`mac` LIKE CONCAT('%',replace(replace(#{multipleQuery},'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%') )

mapper.select: select ab.id,ab.name,ab.importance from asset_business ab INNER JOIN asset_business_relation abr on ab.id =abr.asset_business_id where abr.asset_id=#{id} and abr.`status`=1
select filed_name filedName, filed_value filedValue,type operationType,rollback_table_name rollbackTableName,name name from asset_rollback where asset_id=#{assetId} and status=1

SELECT distinct CONCAT_WS('&',air.ip,amr.mac) as keyId,a.number as assetNumber,a.name assetName from asset a left join asset_ip_relation air on a.id = air.asset_id and air.`status` = 1 left join asset_mac_relation amr on a.id = amr.asset_id and amr.`status` = 1 WHERE a.status = 1 and CONCAT_WS('&',air.ip,amr.mac) in
CONCAT_WS('&',#{item.ip},#{item.mac})

SELECT a.area_id as areaId, r.ip FROM asset a LEFT JOIN asset_ip_relation r ON ( a.id = r.asset_id AND a.`status` = 1 AND r.`status` = 1 ) WHERE LOCATE(#{areaId}, left(area_id, length(#{areaId})))>0 and a.asset_status not in
#{code}

SELECT count(distinct asset.id) FROM ( select asset.*, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT air.ip ) AS ip, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT amr.mac ) AS mac from asset left join asset_ip_relation air on (asset.id = air.asset_id and air.status = 1) left join asset_mac_relation amr on (asset.id = amr.asset_id and amr.status = 1)
group by asset.id ) asset left join baseline_template_hist bt on asset.baseline_template_id = bt.id left join asset_business_relation abr on (asset.id=abr.asset_id and abr.status=1) left join asset_group_relation agr on (asset.id = agr.asset_id = agr.status = 1) left join asset_key_manage akm on (akm.key_user_type = 1 and asset.id = akm.key_user_id and akm.is_delete = 1)
left join asset_user au on (asset.responsible_user_id = au.id and au.status = 1)
select distinct manufacturer from asset where status = 1
select distinct name from asset where status = 1
select distinct version from asset where status = 1
select distinct t1.id, t1.name as value from asset_group t1 where t1.status = 1
select distinct t2.id, t2.name as value from asset t1 left join asset_user t2 on t1.responsible_user_id = t2.id where t1.responsible_user_id is not null and t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1

select distinct t3.id, t3.name as value from asset t1 left join asset_user t2 on t1.responsible_user_id = t2.id left join asset_department t3 on t2.department_id = t3.id where t1.responsible_user_id is not null and t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 and t3.status = 1
select distinct t2.id, t2.tp_name as value from asset t1 left join baseline_template_hist t2 on t1.baseline_template_id = t2.id where t1.status = 1 and t1.baseline_template_id is not null
select distinct t2.id, t2.name as value from asset_business_relation t1 left join asset_business t2 on t1.asset_business_id = t2.id and t2.status = 1 where t2.id is not null
select id,net_type_name as value from asset_nettype_manage where status = 1
mapper.update: update asset set area_id = #{childId} where area_id = #{parentId}
mapper.select: select count(1) count from asset_oa_order tb1 inner join asset_oa_order_handle tb2 on tb1.number = tb2.order_number inner join asset tb3 on tb3.id = tb2.asset_id where tb1.id = #{id}

select tb3.* from asset_oa_order tb1 inner join asset_oa_order_handle tb2 on tb1.number = tb2.order_number inner join asset tb3 on tb3.id = tb2.asset_id where tb1.id = #{id}
LIMIT #{pageSize} offset #{pageOffset}

SELECT a.id FROM asset a inner JOIN asset_mac_relation b ON b.asset_id = a.id AND a.`status` = 1 AND b.`status` = 1 WHERE upper( ( REPLACE ( REPLACE (b.mac, ':', '' ), '-', '' ) ) ) = upper( REPLACE ( REPLACE ( #{mac}, ':', '' ), '-', '' ) )
select count(id) from asset where net_type = #{id}

select count(1) from asset_hard_soft_lib t1 left join asset_cpe_tree t2 on t1.business_id = t2.business_id where t2.business_id is not null
and t1.business_id in
#{item}
and t1.sys_version like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{sysVersion},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.language like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{language},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.soft_version like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{softVersion},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.soft_platform like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{softPlatform},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.hard_platform like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{hardPlatform},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.other like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{other},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')

select t2.unique_id as businessId, t1.cpe_uri as cpeUri, t1.number, t1.type, t1.supplier, t1.product_name as productName, t1.version, t1.sys_version as sysVersion, t1.language, t1.soft_version as soft_version, t1.soft_platform as softPlatform, t1.hard_platform as hardPlatform, t1.other from asset_hard_soft_lib t1 left join asset_cpe_tree t2 on t1.business_id = t2.business_id where t2.business_id is not null
and t1.business_id in
#{item}
and t1.sys_version like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{sysVersion},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.language like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{language},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.soft_version like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{softVersion},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.soft_platform like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{softPlatform},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.hard_platform like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{hardPlatform},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
and t1.other like CONCAT('%',replace(replace(replace(#{other},'\\','\\\\'),'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
LIMIT #{pageSize} offset #{pageOffset}

select t.id as assetId, group_concat(air.ip) as ip, group_concat(amr.mac) as mac, t.number, t.service_life as threshole from asset t left join asset_ip_relation air on (t.id = air.asset_id and air.status = 1) left join asset_mac_relation amr on (t.id = amr.asset_id and amr.status = 1) where t.status = 1 and t.expiration_reminder <= #{time} and t.expiration_reminder > 0 and t.expiration_reminder is not null group by t.id

select t.id as assetId, group_concat(air.ip) as ip, group_concat(amr.mac) as mac, t.number, t.service_life as threshole from asset t left join asset_ip_relation air on (t.id = air.asset_id and air.status = 1) left join asset_mac_relation amr on (t.id = amr.asset_id and amr.status = 1) where t.status = 1 and t.service_life <= #{time} and t.service_life > 0 and t.service_life is not null group by t.id
select mac from asset_mac_relation where asset_id=#{assetId} and status=1
select ip from asset_ip_relation where asset_id=#{assetId} and status=1
